LanguageData.ChjArchDroid.label: ArchoDroid
LanguageData.ChjArchDroid.description:
A race of archotech humanlike worker robots.

Usually found toiling around in colonies around the rim which got archotech level tech.Not capable of sapience making them perfect for colony tasks. 

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. 

Droids are not born and must be created.
LanguageData.ChjArchDroid.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.ChjArchDroid.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.ChjArchDroid.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.label: Destroyer
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.description:
A race of archotech humanlike warrior robots.

Installed into military bases and highly sensitive areas. They show no mercy upon targets who fail to identify themselves. Are traditionally armed with miniguns and core launchers.

Advanced droids are much better than their outdated models in every way. Wardroids possess four arms, each of which is highly deadly. Humans beware: bring an army to defeat this model.

Droids are not born and must be created.
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.tools.0.label: left razor-fist
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.tools.1.label: right razor-fist
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.tools.2.label: lower left razor-fist
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.tools.3.label: lower right razor-fist
LanguageData.ChjArchBattleDroid.tools.4.label: giant body slam
LanguageData.ChjBattleDroid.label.label: Battledroid
